subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova retained her Italian Open title Sunday, beating Li Na, 4-6, 6-4, 7-6 (5), in a wild match in Rome in which play was twice interrupted by rain and the red clay turned to mud.
snippet: Maria Sharapova retained her Italian Open title Sunday, beating Li Na, 4-6, 6-4, 7-6 (5), in a wild match in Rome in which play was twice interrupted by rain and the red clay turned to mud.
